phone.description: The phone number of the person sending the message

message.example: Hello, I would like to know more about your services.

post.description: Create a new info entry with an image upload.

put.description: Update an existing info entry with an image upload.

id.description: The ID of the contact message

name.description: The name of the person who sent the message

email.description: The email of the person who sent the message

message.example: Hello, I would like to know more about your services.

created_at.description: The time when the message was created

updated_at.description: The time when the message was last updated

Accept.description: Header indicating the expected response format. Should be set to 'application/json'.
